weather_report:
The soft whispers of twilight have cast their enchanting charm over Perth as we edge into the tranquility of evening. With the penetrating blue canopy unfettered by clouds, the day has been one of those flawless clear sky wonders that seem carved from a dream. Even now, as the sun has made its ceremonious retreat beneath the western horizon, a radiant form of satisfaction envelops the city. The earlier profusion of light has given business to the stars, winking into view one by one like shy but eager performers taking the stage. The absence of any hint of fog has left everything from the urban sprawl to the skies above in sharp relief, each line and contour boldly pronounced in the crisp evening air.

In this realm of serenity, a gentle waft of coolness suggests a light jacket might be a comforting companion if you're inclined to stroll through Perth’s luminous streets. Such an evening beckons for a leisurely promenade along the riverbanks, or perhaps curling up with a cherished book by an open window, the sounds of the city cushioning the softer tones of a dusk well-spent. There’s a simplicity to savoring the unexpectedly muted symphony of city life, and tonight feels like it was made for just that—an unhurried delight in the ordinary miracles of clear skies and calm ambiance, as you let the gentle night air brush against your skin, carrying with it the distant hum of the day that was.
